name: Target Clicker
description:
⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢GAME⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢⌣⌢

The goal is simple, just click a lot of times on the target and you can:

- buy an automatic slider
- buy a bonus that will give you more money to each clique
- buy a bonus that will reduce your time
- buy a more chic target to finish the game when you get the
latest
try to have the best time when finishing the game
